summary: I EXPERIENCED SUDDEN ACCELERATION WHEN AT A COMPLETE STOP WITH FOOT ON BREAK.  THROTTLE WENT VERY HIGH AND PROPELLED CAR FORWARDED EVEN WHEN PUSHING THE BREAKS PENAL DOWN AS HARD AS I COULD.  THERE IS NO WAY I PUSHED DOWN ON THE WRONG PEDAL.  THE BREAKS COULD NOT HOLD THE CAR STOPPED.  THIS IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS!
